transcripts.text: The wicked run away when no one is chasing them, but the godly are as bold as lions.  Proverbs 28 verse 1 Those who forsake the law praise the wicked, but those who keep the law contend with them.  Evil people do not understand justice, but those who seek the Lord understand it all.  Proverbs 28 verses 4 to 5 Be strong and courageous.  Do not be afraid or terrified because of them.  For the Lord your God goes with you.  He will never leave you or forsake you.  Deuteronomy 31 verse 6.  But this book of the law must not depart from your mouth.  Meditate on it day and night so that you may be careful to do everything written in it, for then you will prosper and succeed in all you do.  Have I not commanded you to be strong and courageous?  Do not be afraid, do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go.  Joshua 1, verse 6-9 When the righteous are in authority, the people rejoice.  Proverbs 29, verse 2.  And he said, O man, greatly beloved, fear not.  Peace be to you.  Be strong, yes, be strong.  So when he spoke to me, I was strengthened.  And said, let my Lord speak, for you have strengthened me.  Be strong and courageous.  Those without courage... Always criticize the brave.  This president has gone to visit St.  John's Church during riots and has held up the word of God.  It is a prophetic gesture.  Come follow me on Vimeo.  Our website is vimeo.com.  slash steveciacolanti.  slash v-o-d underscore pages.  God bless America.
